person.persName: George Porter Slaton (Hopkins County, KY, laborer and farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha C. Slaton. Father of Eugene H. Slaton. Laborer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Hopkins County in 1860. Household owned an additional six enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.
